description:
Tree Preservation Application At:

John Spencer Square, Compton Road, Islington, London N1

TPO Reference:

LBI TPO (No.299) 2006

PO Number:

T090095

Work Specifications:

T1-T2-T3- Compton Road – Thin Crown by 15% and no more than 20% removal of epicormic and adventitious growth remove deadwood in the crowns.

T4- within John Spencer Square - Thin Crown by 15% and no more than 20% removal of epicormic and adventitious growth remove deadwood in the crowns.

T5- within John Spencer Square- Thin Crown by 15% and no more than 20% removal of epicormic and adventitious growth remove deadwood in the crowns.

T7- within John Spencer Square - Chestnut – remove minor deadwood in the crown

T8 – within John Spencer Square - Silver Maple – weak fork with included bark at 2.5 metres – Fell to ground level and remove stump – replace with suitable species

T14- within John Spencer Square - Turkey Oak- remove dead wood and clean out crown.

T15- within John Spencer Square – Rowan- dead wood and clean out crown.

T16- within John Spencer Square – Cherry- Fell to ground level and grind out stump. – Replace with suitable species
decision_conditions: One tree shall be planted in the communal garden area of John Spencer Square as a replacement for T11 of LBI TPO (No.299) 2006. Tree species shall be, Davidia involucrata (Handkerchief Trees) to be planted within one planting season of the felling of tree T11 (Cherry) on site.
